QuestData.Title: The Golden Isle
QuestData.Description:
Pirate-King Zem'lan don't stay in de port with de rest of us. Too good to crack a jug with his crew no more.
We gotta sail out to de Golden Isle to find him. That be de forbidden island where Zem'lan hoards all of de treasure we've pillaged and plundered, so only he can enjoy dem.
Hop in my boat and we'll row out dere together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride in Jamboya's boat out to the Golden Isle.
